cell: 2020年是联合国成立75周年，也是世界反法西斯战争和中国人民抗日战争胜利75周年。

The year 2020 marks the 75th anniversary of the founding of the United Nations (UN) and the 75th anniversary of the end of the World Anti-Fascist War and the Chinese People's War of Resistance against Japanese Aggression.
75年前，世界各国人民以“欲免后世再遭今代人类两度身历惨不堪言之战祸”的决心，建立了联合国这一最具普遍性、代表性、权威性的国际组织,确立了以联合国宪章宗旨和原则为核心的国际秩序和国际体系

Seventy-five years ago, with the determination to 'save succeeding generations from the scourge of war, which twice in our lifetime has brought untold sorrow to mankind', we the peoples founded the UN as the most universal, representative and authoritative international organization and established an international order and system underpinned by the purposes and principles of the UN Charter.
掀开了世界和平与发展事业的新篇章。
Thus began a new era in mankind's pursuit of peace and development.
